>
[Basic Magus Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2950) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 75 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

You gain the [basic bounded spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=1485).

<title level="2">Basic Magus Spellcasting leads to...</title>
